content:
atement is a completely false statement. Whether or not Mr. Bennett
knew of your relationship with Ms. Lewinsky, the statement that there
was “no sex of any kind in any manner, shape or form, with President
Clinton,” was an utterly false statement. Is that correct?
A:It depends on what the meaning of the word “is” is. If...“is” means is
and never has been,. . . that is one thing. If it means there is none, that
was a completely true statement....
Q:I just want to make sure I understand, Mr. Pres
